section.title: NAME
section.p: limit - Limit the maximum number of returned records.

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.p: Limit the maximum number of returned records.

plentry.pd:
The parameter "num" specifies the maximum number of returned records.
Format The method "cousor.limit()" contains the parameter "num". It is in the type of "int". If the value of "num" is not specified, it will return all the records in the result set. If only the first 5 records are wanted, the value of "num"should be set as 5.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Select records with the value of "age" greater than 10 in the collection "bar" and return the first 10 records.

note.p: If the amount of records in the result set is lesser than 10, it will return all the records. If it is greater than 10, it will return the first 10 records.
